track.name: Chocolate Jesus
comments: One of his best. That harmonica gets me every time.
Puts one in mind of Paul McCartney!
Indeed, the Wolf was quite a big man. I doubt Tom Waits will grow that much seeing as he reached adulthood a long time ago.
Hahaahaha... "Similar artists - Howling Wolf" In his wet dreams will Waits ever be of the statue of Wolf.

OK, I'll be honest.. At first I totally hated this song!! (and I'm not religious or something..) And now for the past two days, I can't get it out of my head.. I'm going crazy, but it's just too good!
This song is awesome, the harmonica sounds like an old rusty gate.
A chocolate Jesus a day keeps the doctor away.
tru dude get off the internet, you are truly stupid.
"This song is wicked cool! it's about Barak Obama, no? " stfu go to hell and die forever racist

tru_dude  wrote:
November 2008

    This song is wicked cool! it's about Barak Obama, no? 

honestly. how could you interpret this as a song about obama? thats probably the dumbest thing i have ever heard.
If Jesus were truly made of chocolate, do you think more people to partake of him? I could go for an Almond Joy right about now.

The man is just a genius!
"...he flows like the big muddy, thats ok.   Pour him over icecream for a nice parfait..."   So awesome.
